sentences.en: A pity that they chose such an insubordinate path for themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们为自己选择了这么一条谋逆犯上的路真让人遗憾.

sentences.en: Do as mother says. If you are insubordinate, father will probably hear of it.
sentences.cn: 按照妈妈说的做, 如果不听话的话就告诉爸爸.

sentences.en: In industry, a worker who is grossly insubordinate is threatened with discharge.
sentences.cn: 在企业内部，拒不服从指令的工人会面临遭解雇的威胁。
很多教师不喜欢不服从的儿童.
这种回答是目无领导的.

sentences.en: The professor cited several instances of insubordinate behavior.
sentences.cn: 教授引用数个反抗行为的例证。

sentences.en: These are not stories of abusive familial situations, nor of insubordinate young women.
sentences.cn: 这些不是滥用的家庭情形故事, 也不是关于不听话少妇的故事.

trans.tran_en: If you say that someone is insubordinate, you mean that they do not obey someone of higher rank
